_xResult.title: Best of Power Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made couture dress with structured collar
_xResult.longdesc:
Women of power. Women of strength. Women of finesse. What comes to your mind when you think of these ladies? Hopefully, your own name came up. This couture gown, custom made to your exact measurements, embodies the image of a powerful and graceful female.

 

Once you buy your first Aiste design, you'll be hooked. She is a true artisan and works with high quality and sustainable fabrics. In order to add more structure and visual interest to the linen fabric, it's first stitched with intricate textures. Then the garment is produced specific to your measurements so that it perfectly fits you and your curves. Note that the textured diagonal lines on the bodice of this custom made linen dress streamline your top half, and the flowing nature on the bottom adds weight. You'll draw every eye when you walk into a room.

 

If you've never experienced having a dress made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly! Comes in over 30 beautiful colors, from neutral to brights.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
